text.div:
DDCC_VS

The official URL for this implementation guide is: 

https://worldhealthorganization.github.io/ddcc/ImplementationGuide/fhir.who.ddcc-vs

Digital Documentation of COVID-19 Certificates: Vaccination Status

name: DDCC_VS
title: WHO Digital Documentation of COVID-19 Certificates: Vaccination Status (DDCC:VS)
description: Digital Documentation of COVID-19 Certificates: Vaccination Status

resource.name: Immunization (IPS)
resource.description:
This profile represents the constraints applied to the Immunization resource by the International Patient Summary (IPS) FHIR Implementation Guide. A record of an immunization is represented in the patient summary as an instance of an Immunization resource constrained by this profile.

It describes the event of a patient being administered a vaccination or a record of a vaccination as reported by a patient, a clinician or another party.

resource.name: Patient (IPS)
resource.description: This profile represents the constraints applied to the Patient resource by the International Patient Summary (IPS) FHIR Implementation Guide and describes the minimum expectations for the Patient resource when used in the IPS composition or in one of the referred resources.

resource.name: WHO DDCC Registry Service
resource.description: CapabilityStatement for WHO DDCC Registry Service actor.

resource.name: WHO DDCC Generator
resource.description: CapabilityStatement for WHO DDCC Generator actor.
Rule-based mappings between ICD-11 and SNOMED CT for COVID-19 Disease or Agent Targeted

resource.name: DDCC Submit Health Event Request
resource.description: An [DDCC Submit Health Event Request](StructureDefinition-DDCCSubmitHealthEventRequest.html) is a transaction bundle containing the content of health events which are being submitted under the [Submit Health Event](transactions.html#submit-health-event) transaction.

resource.name: DDCC Submission Set
resource.description: DDCC Submission Set for ITI-65

resource.name: DDCC Immunization Recommendation
resource.description:
A DDCC Immunization Recommendation contains the content corresponding to when
a patient should return for a booster shot.

resource.name: DDCC Vaccine Brand for Immunization
resource.description: DDCC Vaccine Brand for Immunization

resource.name: DDCC Folder
resource.description: DDCC Folder of the Paper Certificate

resource.name: DDCC QR Category Usage Codes
resource.description: Possible formats available for QR usage.

resource.name: DDCC Practitioner Role
resource.description:
Association of an [DDCC Practitioner](StructureDefinition-DDCCPractitioner.html) to a 
managing [DDCC Organization](StructureDefinition-DDCCOrgaznization.html), indicating 
that an DDCC Practitioner is authorized by the public health authority (PHA) to 
vaccinate an [DDCC Patient](StructureDefinition-DDCCPatient.html).

resource.name: DDCC Patient
resource.description:
A DDCCPatient should:
* if the [identifier.assigner](StructureDefinition-DDCCPatient-definitions.html#Patient.identifier] is set then the value of [identifier.assigner](StructureDefinition-DDCCPatient-definitions.html#Patient.identifier.assigner) should be set to reference the [DDCC Organization](StructureDefinition-DDCCOrganization.html) resource associated to the PHA via the [WHO Public Key Directory](actors.html#who-pkd)
* obeys who-ddcc-patient-1

resource.name: DDCC Composition
resource.description:
Describes the logical structure for a Digital Documentation of COVID-19 Certificates 
(DDCC).
DDCC Core Data - Continuity of Care elements.

resource.name: DDCC Organization
resource.description:
Abstraction for a DDCC Organization. There should be a DDCC Organization associated 
to each public health authortiy (PHA) in the [WHO Public Key 
Directory](actors.html#who-pkd)

resource.name: DDCC Core Data Set Questionnaire
resource.description: DDCC Questionnaire for an Immunization event.

resource.name: DDCC Document Reference
resource.description:
A [DDCC Document Reference](StructureDefinition-DDCCDocumentReference.html) is a 
document reference to a [DDCC Document](StructureDefinition-DDCCDocument.html) 
containing the DDCC.
The content attachment url will point to a DDCC Document.

resource.name: DDCC QR Format Codes
resource.description: Possible formats available for QR data.

resource.name: DDCC Add Bundle
resource.description:
Bundle to be transformed to from the DDCC QuestionnaireResponse
to add on the DDCC generator.
Categorization of QR codes by their business usage
Format of the representation of QR code

resource.name: DDCC Provide Document Bundle
resource.description: DDCC Provide Document Bundle for ITI-65

resource.name: DDCC Immunization
resource.description:
A DDCC Immunization contains the content corresponding to a row in the Vaccination 
Events section of a Paper DDCC. While this is not a further profile of the International
Patient Summary (IPS) Immunization resouce, this is intended to map into an IPS 
Immunization resource.
Generate one or more signed DDCC Documents based on a [DDCC QuestionnaireResponse](StructureDefinition-DDCCQuestionnaireResponse.html)

resource.name: DDCC Document
resource.description: A [DDCC Document](StructureDefinition-DDCCDocument.html) is a document bundle containing the DDCC.

resource.name: DDCC Questionnaire Response
resource.description: Describes the logical structure for a questionnaire response associacted to a [DDCC Questionaire](StructureDefinition-DDCCQuestionnaire.html).

resource.name: DDCC Vaccine Valid From
resource.description: Date upon which provided vaccination is considered valid

resource.name: DDCC Practitioner
resource.description:
Container for an DDCC Practitioner, which is a Practitioner authorized by the PHA to 
vaccinate an [DDCC Patient](StructureDefinition-DDCCPatient.html).

resource.name: DDCC Vaccine Market Authorization for Immunization
resource.description: DDCC Vaccine Market Authorization for Immunization

resource.name: DDCC Questionniare
resource.description: Describes the logical structure for a questionnaire associacted to a DDCC which includes a Structure Map to generate the relevant DDCC from a given [DDCC QuestionnaireResponse](StructureDefintion-DDCCQuestionnaireResponse.html) which responds to the DDCC Questionnaire.
Rule-based mappings between ICD-11 and SNOMED CT for COVID-19 Vaccines

resource.name: DDCC Country Of Vaccination for Immunization
resource.description: DDCC Country Of Vaccination for Immunization

resource.name: WHO Disease or Agent Targeted (COVID-19)
resource.description: WHO Disease or Agent Targeted List (COVID-19) from [ICD 11](https://icd.who.int/browse11)

resource.name: DDCC Submit Health Event Response
resource.description: A DDCC Submit Health Event Response](StructureDefinition-DDCCSubmitHealthEventRespose.html) is a transaction reponse bundle containing the operation outcomes for the submission of one or more health certificates under the [Submit Health Event](transactions.html#submit-health-event) transaction.
DDCC Core Data - Proof of Vaccination elements.

resource.name: WHO Vaccine List (COVID-19)
resource.description: WHO Vaccine List (COVID-19) from [ICD 11](https://icd.who.int/browse11)
